referenceObject.reference: Li, Y. Y. & Wei, M. (2025). A star-crossed new species of Draconarius Ovtchinnikov, 1999 (Araneae, Agelenidae) from Southwest China, which male and female previously misattributed to two different species. The Indochina Entomologist 1(87): 863-873. doi: 10.70590/ice.2025.01.87
